content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: DisablePolicyGroup path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/waf/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/sites/{site_id}/policy_groups/{policy_group_id}/disable content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name siteid
desc a site id
in path
required true
schema
type str
name policygroupid
desc a waf policy group id
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum disable all policies in a group
responses
title: 17_Policies_DisablePolicyGroup_94.json
